participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, Emma has a strong desire to succeed in her career as a lawyer. She is hardworking and dedicated to her goals.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, Jake enjoys fitness and staying active. He tends to be straightforward and sometimes struggles to empathize with others.
participant_2.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored.
